contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox artist | name = Yvonne Georgi | image = File:Yvonne Georgi.jpg | image_size = 250px | alt = | caption = | birth_name = | birth_date = <!-- {{Birth date|1903|10|09}} --> | birth_place = [[Leipzig]] | death_date = <!-- {{Death date and age|1975|01|25|1903|10|09}} --> | death_place = [[Hannover]] | nationality = [[Germany|German]] | spouse = | field = Dancer, choreographer and balletmistress | training = | movement = | works = | patrons = | influenced by = [[Mary Wigman]] and Robert Gergi | influenced = | awards = | elected = | website = <!-- {{URL|Example.com}} --> | bgcolour = }} '''Yvonne Georgi''' (October 29, 1903 in [[Leipzig]] – January 25, 1975 in [[Hannover]]) was a [[Germany|German]] dancer, choreographer and balletmistress. She was known for her comedic talents and her extraordinary jumping ability.<ref name = "tanzarchiv">{{Cite web | title = Yvonne Georgi, 1903=1975 | work = SK Stiftung Kultur - Deutsches Tanzarchiv Koln | accessdate = 2013-05-19 | url = http://www.sk-kultur.de/tanz/georgi.htm }}</ref> In her roles as dancer, choreographer and ballet mistress she was an influential figure in dance for decades.<ref name = "fembio">{{Cite web | title = Yvonne Georgi | work = Biographie bei Fembio | accessdate = 2013-05-19 | url = http://www.fembio.org/biographie.php/frau/biographie/yvonne-georgi/ }}</ref> Georgi was born in [[Leipzig]]. Along with [[Gret Palucca]] and [[Hanya Holm]], she was one of the best-known students of [[Mary Wigman]] and Robert Gergi. During the 1920s she and [[Harald Kreutzberg]] successfully toured the [[United States|USA]]. She worked in [[Amsterdam]] and [[Hannover]]. She had numerous premiÃ¨re performances, among them the Electronic Ballet in 1957 to the music of [[Henk Badings]]. She died in Hannover.<ref name = "fembio"/> == References == {{Reflist}} {{Ballet}} {{Authority control|VIAF=59878469}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | name=Georgi%2C Yvonne | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = October 29, 1903 | PLACE OF BIRTH = Leipzig | DATE OF DEATH = January 25, 1975 | PLACE OF DEATH = Hannover }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Georgi, Yvonne}} [[Category:German ballerinas]] [[Category:Ballet choreographers]] [[Category:Ballet mistresses]] [[Category:German choreographers]] [[Category:1903 births]] [[Category:1975 deaths]] {{Women's-History-stub}}
